site_description: A simple way to integrate internationalization on a small web site project.
fallback_text: This text is not available in Russian.

nested.one: There is one monkey in the tree.
nested.more: There are {0} monkeys in the tree.

options.activeClass: Class to add to the active language.
options.isTogglerSelect: Whether the toggler is a select or a button.
options.saveLang: Whether to save the language in localStorage.
options.saveAs: Name of the key to save the language in localStorage.
options.translate: Function that translate the text manually.
options.onChange: Function that handle after each language change.
